mapper.select: SELECT ETC_CD, ETC_CD_NM FROM EPCN_ETC_CD A ,(SELECT LANG_SE_CD FROM EPCN_LANG_CD WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' AND STD_YN = 'Y' AND ROWNUM = '1') C WHERE 1=1 AND A.LANG_SE_CD = C.LANG_SE_CD AND GRP_CD = 'B001' AND ETC_CD IN ('M1','M2','W1','W2') ORDER BY SEL_ORD

SELECT A.STAC_DOC_NO ,A.EXCA_STD_CD ,A.EXCA_REG_DT , ''||TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.EXCA_REG_DT,'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYY-MM-DD')||'' AS EXCA_REG_DT_PAGE ,B.BIZR_TP_CD ,EPCN_ETC_NM(B.BIZR_TP_CD, 'B001') AS BIZR_TP_NM ,B.BIZRNM ,EPCN_ETC_NM(DECODE(A.EXCA_SE_CD,'A',A.ACP_BANK_CD,'C',A.PAY_BANK_CD), 'S090') AS BANK_NM ,ECL_DECRYPT(DECODE(A.EXCA_SE_CD,'A',A.ACP_ACCT_NO,'C',A.PAY_ACCT_NO)) AS ACCT_NO ,A.EXCA_AMT ,A.EXCA_ISSU_SE_CD ,A.EXCA_SE_CD ,A.EXCA_PROC_STAT_CD ,EPCN_ETC_NM(A.EXCA_ISSU_SE_CD, 'C025') AS EXCA_ISSU_SE_NM ,EPCN_ETC_NM(A.EXCA_SE_CD, 'C023') AS EXCA_SE_NM ,CASE WHEN A.EXCA_PROC_STAT_CD = 'A' THEN '' || EPCN_ETC_NM(A.EXCA_PROC_STAT_CD, 'C024') || '' ELSE EPCN_ETC_NM(A.EXCA_PROC_STAT_CD, 'C024') END AS EXCA_PROC_STAT_NM_PAGE ,EPCN_ETC_NM(A.EXCA_PROC_STAT_CD, 'C024') AS EXCA_PROC_STAT_NM ,EXCA_ACP_CFM_SEQ ,TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.REAL_PAY_DT || A.REAL_PAY_TM, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS REAL_PAY_DT ,A.ACP_DT ,A.STD_YEAR ,A.YEAR_CHG_YN FROM EPGM_EXCA_LST A ,EPCN_BIZR_INFO B WHERE 1=1 AND A.EXCA_STD_CD IS NULL AND A.EXCA_ISSU_SE_CD in ('C') /* 교환정산 */ AND A.EXCA_STD_CD = #{EXCA_STD_CD_SEL} AND A.EXCA_ISSU_SE_CD in ('G', 'F', 'W') AND A.BIZRID = B.BIZRID AND A.BIZRNO = B.BIZRNO AND B.BIZR_TP_CD = #{BIZR_TP_CD_SEL} AND B.BIZRNM LIKE '%' || #{BIZRNM_SEL} || '%' AND A.EXCA_SE_CD = #{EXCA_SE_CD_SEL} AND A.EXCA_PROC_STAT_CD = #{EXCA_PROC_STAT_CD_SEL} ORDER BY A.EXCA_REG_DT DESC, B.SEL_ORD, B.BIZRNM

SELECT A.STAC_DOC_NO ,NVL(C.EXCA_ST_DT, A.STD_YEAR||'0101') AS EXCA_ST_DT ,NVL(C.EXCA_END_DT, A.STD_YEAR||'1231') AS EXCA_END_DT ,B.BIZRNM ,ECL_DECRYPT(B.BIZRNO) AS BIZRNO_DE ,B.RPST_NM ,B.BIZRNO ,B.RPST_TEL_NO1||'-'||B.RPST_TEL_NO2||'-'||B.RPST_TEL_NO3 AS RPST_TEL_NO ,B.ADDR1||' '||B.ADDR2 AS ADDR ,NVL(A.EXCA_AMT, 0) AS EXCA_AMT ,ECL_DECRYPT(DECODE(A.EXCA_SE_CD,'A',A.ACP_ACCT_NO,'C',A.PAY_ACCT_NO)) AS ACP_ACCT_NO ,EPCN_ETC_NM(DECODE(A.EXCA_SE_CD,'A',A.ACP_BANK_CD,'C',A.PAY_BANK_CD), 'S090') AS ACP_BANK_NM ,EPCN_ETC_NM(A.EXCA_ISSU_SE_CD, 'C025') AS EXCA_ISSU_SE_NM ,EPCN_ETC_NM(A.EXCA_SE_CD, 'C023') AS EXCA_SE_NM ,NVL(A.AGTN_BAL_PAY_AMT, 0) AS AGTN_BAL_PAY_AMT /* 추가보증금잔액 */ ,NVL(A.DRVL_BAL_PAY_AMT, 0) AS DRVL_BAL_PAY_AMT /* 직접회수미지급잔액 */ ,NVL(A.EXCA_PLAN_GTN_BAL, 0) AS EXCA_PLAN_GTN_BAL /* 정산보증금잔액 */ ,NVL(A.GTN_BAL_INDE_AMT, 0) AS GTN_BAL_INDE_AMT /* 보증금 증감액 */ ,NVL(A.AGTN_INDE_AMT, 0) AS AGTN_INDE_AMT /* 추가보증금 증감액 */ ,NVL(A.EXCA_GTN_BAL, 0) AS EXCA_GTN_BAL /* 정산보증금예정잔액 */ ,NVL(A.AGTN_BAL_PAY_AMT, 0) + NVL(A.AGTN_INDE_AMT, 0) as AGTN_BAL /* 추가보증금 예정잔액 */ ,NVL(A.DRVL_BAL_PAY_AMT, 0) - NVL(A.DRVL_BAL_ADJ_AMT, 0) AS DRVL_BAL /* 직접회수미지급 예정 잔액 */ ,NVL(A.DRVL_BAL_ADJ_AMT, 0) AS DRVL_BAL_ADJ_AMT /* 직접회수 조정 금액 */ ,A.RISU_RSN ,A.RISU_DT ,NVL(A.ADD_AMT, 0) AS ADD_AMT ,A.ADD_AMT_SE ,DECODE(A.ADD_AMT_SE,'G', '보증금', 'F', '수수료', 'E', '기타') AS ADD_AMT_SE_NM ,A.EXCA_PROC_STAT_CD ,A.EXCA_SE_CD ,A.EXCA_ISSU_SE_CD ,A.MNUL_ISSU_RSN FROM EPGM_EXCA_LST A ,EPCN_BIZR_INFO B ,EXCA_STD_MGNT C WHERE 1=1 AND A.STAC_DOC_NO = #{STAC_DOC_NO} AND A.EXCA_ISSU_SE_CD = #{EXCA_ISSU_SE_CD} AND A.BIZRID = B.BIZRID AND A.BIZRNO = B.BIZRNO AND A.EXCA_STD_CD = C.EXCA_STD_CD(+)

SELECT B.ETC_CD ,B.ETC_CD_NM ,NVL(A.PAY_PLAN_AMT, 0) AS PAY_PLAN_AMT ,NVL(A.PAY_MDT_AMT, 0) AS PAY_MDT_AMT ,NVL(A.ACP_PLAN_AMT, 0) AS ACP_PLAN_AMT ,NVL(A.PAY_PLAN_AMT, 0) - NVL(A.ACP_PLAN_AMT, 0) AS OFF_SET_AMT FROM ( SELECT 'A' AS GBN ,CASE WHEN SIGN(NVL(DLIVY_GTN,0)) = -1 THEN ABS(NVL(DLIVY_GTN,0)) ELSE 0 END AS PAY_PLAN_AMT ,NULL AS PAY_MDT_AMT ,CASE WHEN SIGN(NVL(DLIVY_GTN,0)) = -1 THEN 0 ELSE ABS(NVL(DLIVY_GTN,0)) END AS ACP_PLAN_AMT FROM (SELECT SUM(A.DLIVY_GTN) AS DLIVY_GTN, COUNT(1) AS CNT FROM EXCA_DLIVY_CRCT A WHERE 1=1 AND STAC_DOC_NO = #{STAC_DOC_NO} ) TBL WHERE 1=1 AND CNT > 0
UNION ALL
SELECT 'B' AS GBN ,CASE WHEN SIGN(NVL(WRHS_GTN,0)-NVL(WRHS_CRCT_GTN,0)) = -1 THEN 0 ELSE ABS(NVL(WRHS_GTN,0)-NVL(WRHS_CRCT_GTN,0)) END AS PAY_PLAN_AMT ,NULL AS PAY_MDT_AMT ,CASE WHEN SIGN(NVL(WRHS_GTN,0)-NVL(WRHS_CRCT_GTN,0)) = -1 THEN ABS(NVL(WRHS_GTN,0)-NVL(WRHS_CRCT_GTN,0)) ELSE 0 END AS ACP_PLAN_AMT FROM (SELECT SUM(WRHS_GTN_B) AS WRHS_GTN ,SUM(WRHS_GTN_A) AS WRHS_CRCT_GTN ,COUNT(1) AS CNT FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT A.WRHS_DOC_NO ,WRHS_GTN_A ,(NVL(CFM_GTN_TOT,0)+NVL(CRCT_GTN,0)) AS WRHS_GTN_B FROM ( SELECT LK_WRHS_CRCT_DOC_NO ,CASE WHEN LK_WRHS_CRCT_DOC_NO IS NOT NULL AND MNUL_EXCA_SE IS NOT NULL THEN '' ELSE WRHS_DOC_NO END AS WRHS_DOC_NO ,SUM(A.CRCT_GTN) AS WRHS_GTN_A FROM EXCA_WRHS_CRCT A WHERE 1=1 AND #{STAC_DOC_NO} = DECODE( #{EXCA_ISSU_SE_CD}, 'W', A.WHSDL_STAC_DOC_NO, A.MFC_STAC_DOC_NO) GROUP BY A.LK_WRHS_CRCT_DOC_NO, A.WRHS_DOC_NO, A.MNUL_EXCA_SE UNION ALL SELECT DISTINCT LK_WRHS_CRCT_DOC_NO ,CASE WHEN LK_WRHS_CRCT_DOC_NO IS NOT NULL AND MNUL_EXCA_SE IS NOT NULL THEN '' ELSE WRHS_DOC_NO END AS WRHS_DOC_NO ,CASE WHEN B.GTN < 0 THEN 0 ELSE B.GTN END AS WRHS_GTN_A FROM EXCA_WRHS_CRCT A , EPGM_EXCA_DTL B, EPGM_EXCA_LST C WHERE 1=1 AND B.MAPP_DOC_NO = A.WRHS_CRCT_DOC_NO AND B.STAC_DOC_NO = #{STAC_DOC_NO} AND B.STAC_DOC_NO = C.STAC_DOC_NO AND 'G' = C.EXCA_ISSU_SE_CD AND 'Y' = C.YEAR_CHG_YN ) A ,(
SELECT DISTINCT A.WRHS_DOC_NO , CASE WHEN C.YEAR_CHG_YN ='Y' AND NVL(B.GTN,0) > 0 THEN 0 ELSE A.CFM_GTN_TOT END AS CFM_GTN_TOT FROM EPCM_CFM_MST A, EXCA_WRHS_CRCT AA , EPGM_EXCA_DTL B, EPGM_EXCA_LST C WHERE 1=1 AND A.RTN_STAT_CD = 'PC' /* 지급확인 */ AND A.WRHS_DOC_NO = AA.WRHS_DOC_NO AND #{STAC_DOC_NO} = B.STAC_DOC_NO(+) AND B.STAC_DOC_NO = C.STAC_DOC_NO(+) AND 'G' = C.EXCA_ISSU_SE_CD(+) AND 'Y' = C.YEAR_CHG_YN(+) ) B ,( SELECT DISTINCT A.WRHS_CRCT_DOC_NO ,A.WRHS_DOC_NO ,SUM(A.CRCT_GTN) AS CRCT_GTN FROM EXCA_WRHS_CRCT A WHERE 1=1 AND WRHS_CRCT_STAT_CD = 'E' /* 도매업자정산 */ AND NVL(MNUL_EXCA_SE, 'C') NOT IN ('M', 'R') /* 수기등록, 재정산등록 */ GROUP BY A.WRHS_CRCT_DOC_NO, A.WRHS_DOC_NO ) C WHERE 1=1 AND A.WRHS_DOC_NO = B.WRHS_DOC_NO(+) AND A.LK_WRHS_CRCT_DOC_NO = C.WRHS_CRCT_DOC_NO(+) )
WHERE 1=1 ) C WHERE 1=1 AND CNT > 0
UNION ALL
SELECT GBN, PAY_PLAN_AMT, PAY_MDT_AMT, ACP_PLAN_AMT FROM ( SELECT 'C' AS GBN ,CASE WHEN SIGN(SUM(NVL(DRCT_PAY_GTN,0))) = -1 THEN 0 ELSE ABS(SUM(NVL(DRCT_PAY_GTN,0))) END AS PAY_PLAN_AMT ,NULL AS PAY_MDT_AMT ,CASE WHEN SIGN(SUM(NVL(DRCT_PAY_GTN,0))) = -1 THEN ABS(SUM(NVL(DRCT_PAY_GTN,0))) ELSE 0 END AS ACP_PLAN_AMT ,COUNT(1) AS CNT FROM EXCA_DRCT_RTRVL_CRCT A WHERE 1=1 AND STAC_DOC_NO = #{STAC_DOC_NO} ) WHERE 1=1 AND CNT > 0
UNION ALL
SELECT 'D' AS GBN /* 교환정산 과거데이터 */ ,PAY_PLAN_AMT ,PAY_MDT_AMT ,ACP_PLAN_AMT FROM ( SELECT SUM(EXCH_DLIVY_GTN) AS PAY_PLAN_AMT ,NULL AS PAY_MDT_AMT ,SUM(EXCH_WRHS_GTN) AS ACP_PLAN_AMT ,COUNT(1) AS CNT FROM EXCA_EXCH WHERE STAC_DOC_NO = #{STAC_DOC_NO} ) WHERE 1=1 AND CNT > 0
UNION ALL
SELECT DECODE(ADJ_SE,'C','E','D','F','R','I','E','J') AS GBN ,CASE WHEN SIGN(NVL(ADJ_GTN,0)) = -1 THEN 0 ELSE ABS(NVL(ADJ_GTN,0)) END AS PAY_PLAN_AMT ,NULL AS PAY_MDT_AMT ,CASE WHEN SIGN(NVL(ADJ_GTN,0)) = -1 THEN ABS(NVL(ADJ_GTN,0)) ELSE 0 END AS ACP_PLAN_AMT FROM (SELECT A.ADJ_SE ,SUM(DECODE(#{STAC_DOC_NO}, NVL(A.STAC_DOC_NO,''), CASE WHEN A.ADJ_RST_QTY > A.FYER_QTY THEN A.ADJ_GTN WHEN A.ADJ_RST_QTY < A.FYER_QTY THEN -1 * A.ADJ_GTN END ,NVL(A.STAC_DOC_NO2,'') , CASE WHEN A.ADJ_RST_QTY > A.FYER_QTY THEN -1 * A.ADJ_GTN WHEN A.ADJ_RST_QTY < A.FYER_QTY THEN A.ADJ_GTN END)) AS ADJ_GTN FROM EXCA_FYER_CRCT A WHERE 1=1 AND (STAC_DOC_NO = #{STAC_DOC_NO} OR STAC_DOC_NO2 = #{STAC_DOC_NO}) GROUP BY A.ADJ_SE ORDER BY A.ADJ_SE ) WHERE 1=1
UNION ALL
SELECT 'G' AS GBN ,A.AGTN_BAL_ADJ_AMT AS PAY_PLAN_AMT ,0 AS PAY_MDT_AMT ,0 AS ACP_PLAN_AMT FROM EPGM_EXCA_LST A WHERE 1=1 AND A.STAC_DOC_NO = #{STAC_DOC_NO} AND A.AGTN_BAL_ADJ_AMT > 0
UNION ALL
SELECT 'H' AS GBN ,A.DRVL_BAL_ADJ_AMT AS PAY_PLAN_AMT ,0 AS PAY_MDT_AMT ,0 AS ACP_PLAN_AMT FROM EPGM_EXCA_LST A WHERE 1=1 AND A.STAC_DOC_NO = #{STAC_DOC_NO} AND A.DRVL_BAL_ADJ_AMT > 0
UNION ALL
SELECT EXCA_DTL_CD AS GBN ,PAY_PLAN_AMT ,0 AS PAY_MDT_AMT ,ACP_PLAN_AMT FROM EPGM_EXCA_DTL_MNUL A WHERE 1=1 AND A.STAC_DOC_NO = #{STAC_DOC_NO} AND A.EXCA_DTL_CD IN ('K','L','M') ) A ,EPCN_ETC_CD B ,(SELECT LANG_SE_CD FROM EPCN_LANG_CD WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' AND STD_YN = 'Y' AND ROWNUM = '1') C WHERE 1=1 AND B.GRP_CD = 'C022' AND B.ETC_CD = A.GBN AND B.LANG_SE_CD = C.LANG_SE_CD AND B.USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY B.ETC_CD

SELECT B.ETC_CD ,B.ETC_CD_NM ,NVL(A.PAY_PLAN_AMT, 0) AS PAY_PLAN_AMT ,NVL(A.PAY_MDT_AMT, 0) AS PAY_MDT_AMT ,NVL(A.ACP_PLAN_AMT, 0) AS ACP_PLAN_AMT ,NVL(A.PAY_PLAN_AMT, 0) - NVL(A.ACP_PLAN_AMT, 0) AS OFF_SET_AMT FROM ( SELECT 'B' AS GBN ,CASE WHEN SIGN(NVL(WRHS_FEE,0)) = -1 THEN 0 ELSE ABS(NVL(WRHS_FEE,0)) END AS PAY_PLAN_AMT ,NULL AS PAY_MDT_AMT ,CASE WHEN SIGN(NVL(WRHS_FEE,0)) = -1 THEN ABS(NVL(WRHS_FEE,0)) ELSE 0 END AS ACP_PLAN_AMT FROM (SELECT SUM(CFM_FEE - CRCT_FEE) AS WRHS_FEE ,COUNT(1) AS CNT FROM ( SELECT A.LK_WRHS_CRCT_DOC_NO, A.WRHS_DOC_NO, A.CRCT_FEE, NVL(B.CFM_FEE,0)+NVL(C.CRCT_FEE,0) AS CFM_FEE FROM ( SELECT LK_WRHS_CRCT_DOC_NO ,CASE WHEN LK_WRHS_CRCT_DOC_NO IS NOT NULL AND MNUL_EXCA_SE IS NOT NULL THEN '' ELSE WRHS_DOC_NO END AS WRHS_DOC_NO ,SUM(A.CRCT_WHSL_FEE + A.CRCT_WHSL_FEE_STAX + A.CRCT_RTL_FEE) AS CRCT_FEE FROM EXCA_WRHS_CRCT A WHERE 1=1 AND #{STAC_DOC_NO} = DECODE( #{EXCA_ISSU_SE_CD}, 'W', A.WHSDL_STAC_DOC_NO, A.MFC_STAC_DOC_NO) GROUP BY A.LK_WRHS_CRCT_DOC_NO, A.WRHS_DOC_NO, A.MNUL_EXCA_SE ) A ,( SELECT B.WRHS_DOC_NO ,SUM(B.CFM_WHSL_FEE_TOT + B.CFM_WHSL_FEE_STAX_TOT + B.CFM_RTL_FEE_TOT) AS CFM_FEE FROM EPCM_CFM_MST B WHERE 1=1 AND B.RTN_STAT_CD = 'PC' /* 지급확인 */ GROUP BY B.WRHS_DOC_NO ) B ,( SELECT A.WRHS_CRCT_DOC_NO ,A.WRHS_DOC_NO ,SUM(CRCT_WHSL_FEE+CRCT_WHSL_FEE_STAX+CRCT_RTL_FEE) AS CRCT_FEE FROM EXCA_WRHS_CRCT A WHERE 1=1 AND WRHS_CRCT_STAT_CD = 'E' /* 도매업자정산 */ AND NVL(MNUL_EXCA_SE, 'C') NOT IN ('M', 'R') /* 수기등록, 재정산등록 */ GROUP BY A.WRHS_CRCT_DOC_NO, A.WRHS_DOC_NO ) C WHERE 1=1 AND A.WRHS_DOC_NO = B.WRHS_DOC_NO(+) AND A.LK_WRHS_CRCT_DOC_NO = C.WRHS_CRCT_DOC_NO(+) )
WHERE 1=1 ) C WHERE 1=1
UNION ALL
SELECT EXCA_DTL_CD AS GBN ,PAY_PLAN_AMT ,0 AS PAY_MDT_AMT ,ACP_PLAN_AMT FROM EPGM_EXCA_DTL_MNUL A WHERE 1=1 AND A.STAC_DOC_NO = #{STAC_DOC_NO} AND A.EXCA_DTL_CD IN ('K','L','M') ) A ,EPCN_ETC_CD B ,(SELECT LANG_SE_CD FROM EPCN_LANG_CD WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' AND STD_YN = 'Y' AND ROWNUM = '1') C WHERE 1=1 AND B.GRP_CD = 'C022' AND B.ETC_CD = A.GBN AND B.LANG_SE_CD = C.LANG_SE_CD AND B.USE_YN = 'Y' AND ABS(A.PAY_PLAN_AMT) + ABS(A.ACP_PLAN_AMT) > 0 ORDER BY B.ETC_CD

SELECT A.DLIVY_DT ,B.BIZRNM AS MFC_BIZRNM ,B.BRCH_NM AS MFC_BRCH_NM ,C.BIZRNM AS CUST_BIZRNM ,D.CTNR_NM ,EPCN_ETC_NM(D.CPCT_CD, 'E001') AS CPCT_NM ,EPCN_ETC_NM(D.PRPS_CD, 'E002') AS PRPS_NM ,A.DLIVY_QTY ,A.DLIVY_GTN ,DLIVY_CRCT_STAT_CD ,EPCN_ETC_NM(DLIVY_CRCT_STAT_CD, 'C001') AS DLIVY_CRCT_STAT_NM FROM EXCA_DLIVY_CRCT A ,EPCN_BRCH_INFO B ,EPCN_BIZR_INFO C ,EPCN_STD_CTNR_CD D ,(SELECT LANG_SE_CD FROM EPCN_LANG_CD WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' AND STD_YN = 'Y' AND ROWNUM = '1') F WHERE 1=1 AND A.STAC_DOC_NO = #{STAC_DOC_NO} AND A.MFC_BIZRID = B.BIZRID AND A.MFC_BIZRNO = B.BIZRNO AND A.MFC_BRCH_ID = B.BRCH_ID AND A.MFC_BRCH_NO = B.BRCH_NO AND A.CUST_BIZRID = C.BIZRID AND A.CUST_BIZRNO = C.BIZRNO AND A.CTNR_CD = D.CTNR_CD AND D.LANG_SE_CD = F.LANG_SE_CD ORDER BY A.DLIVY_DT DESC, B.BRCH_NM, C.SEL_ORD, C.BIZRNM

SELECT EPCN_BIZR_NM(MFC_BIZRID, MFC_BIZRNO) AS MFC_BIZRNM ,EPCN_BRCH_NM(MFC_BRCH_ID, MFC_BRCH_NO, MFC_BIZRID, MFC_BIZRNO) AS MFC_BRCH_NM ,EPCN_BIZR_NM(WHSDL_BIZRID, WHSDL_BIZRNO) AS CUST_BIZRNM ,A.* FROM ( SELECT B.WRHS_DOC_NO , B.WRHS_CRCT_DOC_NO , NVL(C.WRHS_CFM_DT, D.CRCT_WRHS_CFM_DT) AS WRHS_CFM_DT_ORI , B.WRHS_CRCT_REG_DT , EPCN_ETC_NM(B.WRHS_CRCT_STAT_CD , 'C002') AS WRHS_CRCT_STAT_CD_NM_ORI , EPCN_ETC_NM(B.MNUL_EXCA_SE , 'C042') AS MNUL_EXCA_SE_NM , B.WRHS_CRCT_STAT_CD , NVL(C.CFM_QTY_TOT, D.CRCT_QTY_TOT) AS CFM_QTY_TOT , NVL(C.CFM_GTN_TOT, D.CRCT_GTN_TOT) AS CFM_GTN_TOT , NVL(C.CFM_FEE_TOT, D.CRCT_FEE_TOT) AS CFM_FEE_TOT , NVL(C.CFM_FEE_STAX_TOT, D.CRCT_FEE_STAX_TOT) AS CFM_FEE_STAX_TOT , NVL(C.CFM_AMT, D.CRCT_AMT) AS CFM_AMT , B.CRCT_QTY_TOT , B.CRCT_GTN_TOT , B.CRCT_WHSL_FEE_TOT + B.CRCT_RTL_FEE_TOT as CRCT_FEE_TOT , B.CRCT_WHSL_FEE_STAX_TOT as CRCT_FEE_STAX_TOT , B.CRCT_GTN_TOT+ B.CRCT_WHSL_FEE_TOT+B.CRCT_WHSL_FEE_STAX_TOT+B.CRCT_RTL_FEE_TOT AS CRCT_AMT , NVL(C.MFC_BIZRID, MNUL_MFC_BIZRID) AS MFC_BIZRID , NVL(C.MFC_BIZRNO, MNUL_MFC_BIZRNO) AS MFC_BIZRNO , NVL(C.MFC_BRCH_ID, MNUL_MFC_BRCH_ID) AS MFC_BRCH_ID , NVL(C.MFC_BRCH_NO, MNUL_MFC_BRCH_NO) AS MFC_BRCH_NO , NVL(C.WHSDL_BIZRID, MNUL_WHSDL_BIZRID) AS WHSDL_BIZRID , NVL(C.WHSDL_BIZRNO, MNUL_WHSDL_BIZRNO) AS WHSDL_BIZRNO , NVL(C.WHSDL_BRCH_ID, MNUL_WHSDL_BRCH_ID) AS WHSDL_BRCH_ID , NVL(C.WHSDL_BRCH_NO, MNUL_WHSDL_BRCH_NO) AS WHSDL_BRCH_NO , B.CRCT_WRHS_CFM_DT , B.CRCT_RTN_DT
FROM ( SELECT WRHS_CRCT_DOC_NO ,LK_WRHS_CRCT_DOC_NO ,CASE WHEN LK_WRHS_CRCT_DOC_NO IS NOT NULL AND MNUL_EXCA_SE IS NOT NULL THEN '' ELSE WRHS_DOC_NO END AS WRHS_DOC_NO ,WRHS_CRCT_STAT_CD ,EXCA_STD_CD ,WRHS_CRCT_REG_DT ,SUM(CRCT_QTY) AS CRCT_QTY_TOT ,SUM(CRCT_GTN) AS CRCT_GTN_TOT ,SUM(CRCT_WHSL_FEE) AS CRCT_WHSL_FEE_TOT ,SUM(CRCT_WHSL_FEE_STAX) AS CRCT_WHSL_FEE_STAX_TOT ,SUM(CRCT_RTL_FEE) AS CRCT_RTL_FEE_TOT ,MNUL_EXCA_SE ,MNUL_WHSDL_BIZRID ,MNUL_WHSDL_BIZRNO ,MNUL_WHSDL_BRCH_ID ,MNUL_WHSDL_BRCH_NO ,MNUL_MFC_BIZRID ,MNUL_MFC_BIZRNO ,MNUL_MFC_BRCH_ID ,MNUL_MFC_BRCH_NO ,CRCT_WRHS_CFM_DT ,CRCT_RTN_DT FROM EXCA_WRHS_CRCT WHERE 1=1 AND #{STAC_DOC_NO} = DECODE(#{EXCA_ISSU_SE_CD}, 'W', WHSDL_STAC_DOC_NO, MFC_STAC_DOC_NO) GROUP BY WRHS_CRCT_DOC_NO,LK_WRHS_CRCT_DOC_NO,WRHS_DOC_NO,WRHS_CRCT_STAT_CD,EXCA_STD_CD,WRHS_CRCT_REG_DT ,MNUL_EXCA_SE ,MNUL_WHSDL_BIZRID ,MNUL_WHSDL_BIZRNO ,MNUL_WHSDL_BRCH_ID ,MNUL_WHSDL_BRCH_NO ,MNUL_MFC_BIZRID ,MNUL_MFC_BIZRNO ,MNUL_MFC_BRCH_ID ,MNUL_MFC_BRCH_NO ,CRCT_WRHS_CFM_DT ,CRCT_RTN_DT UNION ALL SELECT WRHS_CRCT_DOC_NO ,LK_WRHS_CRCT_DOC_NO ,CASE WHEN LK_WRHS_CRCT_DOC_NO IS NOT NULL AND MNUL_EXCA_SE IS NOT NULL THEN '' ELSE WRHS_DOC_NO END AS WRHS_DOC_NO ,WRHS_CRCT_STAT_CD ,A.EXCA_STD_CD ,WRHS_CRCT_REG_DT ,CASE WHEN B.GTN < 0 THEN 0 ELSE SUM(CRCT_QTY) END AS CRCT_QTY_TOT ,CASE WHEN B.GTN < 0 THEN 0 ELSE SUM(CRCT_GTN) END AS CRCT_GTN_TOT ,CASE WHEN B.GTN < 0 THEN 0 ELSE SUM(CRCT_WHSL_FEE) END AS CRCT_WHSL_FEE_TOT ,CASE WHEN B.GTN < 0 THEN 0 ELSE SUM(CRCT_WHSL_FEE_STAX) END AS CRCT_WHSL_FEE_STAX_TOT ,CASE WHEN B.GTN < 0 THEN 0 ELSE SUM(CRCT_RTL_FEE) END AS CRCT_RTL_FEE_TOT ,MNUL_EXCA_SE ,MNUL_WHSDL_BIZRID ,MNUL_WHSDL_BIZRNO ,MNUL_WHSDL_BRCH_ID ,MNUL_WHSDL_BRCH_NO ,MNUL_MFC_BIZRID ,MNUL_MFC_BIZRNO ,MNUL_MFC_BRCH_ID ,MNUL_MFC_BRCH_NO ,A.CRCT_WRHS_CFM_DT ,A.CRCT_RTN_DT FROM EXCA_WRHS_CRCT A , EPGM_EXCA_DTL B, EPGM_EXCA_LST C WHERE 1=1 AND B.MAPP_DOC_NO = A.WRHS_CRCT_DOC_NO AND B.STAC_DOC_NO = #{STAC_DOC_NO} AND B.STAC_DOC_NO = C.STAC_DOC_NO AND 'G' = C.EXCA_ISSU_SE_CD AND 'Y' = C.YEAR_CHG_YN
GROUP BY WRHS_CRCT_DOC_NO,LK_WRHS_CRCT_DOC_NO,WRHS_DOC_NO,WRHS_CRCT_STAT_CD,A.EXCA_STD_CD,WRHS_CRCT_REG_DT ,MNUL_EXCA_SE ,MNUL_WHSDL_BIZRID ,MNUL_WHSDL_BIZRNO ,MNUL_WHSDL_BRCH_ID ,MNUL_WHSDL_BRCH_NO ,MNUL_MFC_BIZRID ,MNUL_MFC_BIZRNO ,MNUL_MFC_BRCH_ID ,MNUL_MFC_BRCH_NO ,B.GTN ,A.CRCT_WRHS_CFM_DT ,A.CRCT_RTN_DT )B ,( SELECT A.WRHS_DOC_NO , A.WHSDL_BIZRNO , A.WHSDL_BIZRID , A.WHSDL_BRCH_ID , A.WHSDL_BRCH_NO , A.MFC_BIZRID , A.MFC_BIZRNO , A.MFC_BRCH_ID , A.MFC_BRCH_NO , A.WRHS_CFM_DT , SUM(A.CFM_QTY_TOT) AS CFM_QTY_TOT, SUM(A.CFM_GTN_TOT) AS CFM_GTN_TOT, SUM(A.CFM_FEE_TOT) AS CFM_FEE_TOT, SUM(A.CFM_FEE_STAX_TOT) AS CFM_FEE_STAX_TOT, SUM(A.CFM_AMT) AS CFM_AMT FROM (SELECT DISTINCT A.WRHS_DOC_NO , A.WHSDL_BIZRNO , A.WHSDL_BIZRID , A.WHSDL_BRCH_ID , A.WHSDL_BRCH_NO , A.MFC_BIZRID , A.MFC_BIZRNO , A.MFC_BRCH_ID , A.MFC_BRCH_NO , CASE WHEN C.YEAR_CHG_YN ='Y' AND NVL(B.GTN,0) > 0 THEN 0 ELSE A.FH_CFM_QTY_TOT +A.FB_CFM_QTY_TOT +A.DRCT_CFM_QTY_TOT END AS CFM_QTY_TOT , CASE WHEN C.YEAR_CHG_YN ='Y' AND NVL(B.GTN,0) > 0 THEN 0 ELSE A.CFM_GTN_TOT END AS CFM_GTN_TOT , CASE WHEN C.YEAR_CHG_YN ='Y' AND NVL(B.GTN,0) > 0 THEN 0 ELSE A.CFM_WHSL_FEE_TOT + A.CFM_RTL_FEE_TOT END AS CFM_FEE_TOT , CASE WHEN C.YEAR_CHG_YN ='Y' AND NVL(B.GTN,0) > 0 THEN 0 ELSE A.CFM_WHSL_FEE_STAX_TOT END AS CFM_FEE_STAX_TOT , CASE WHEN C.YEAR_CHG_YN ='Y' AND NVL(B.GTN,0) > 0 THEN 0 ELSE A.CFM_GTN_TOT+A.CFM_WHSL_FEE_TOT+ A.CFM_WHSL_FEE_STAX_TOT+ A.CFM_RTL_FEE_TOT END AS CFM_AMT , A.WRHS_CFM_DT FROM EPCM_CFM_MST A, EXCA_WRHS_CRCT AA , EPGM_EXCA_DTL B, EPGM_EXCA_LST C WHERE 1=1 AND A.RTN_STAT_CD = 'PC' /* 지급확인 */ AND A.WRHS_DOC_NO = AA.WRHS_DOC_NO AND #{STAC_DOC_NO} = B.STAC_DOC_NO(+) AND B.STAC_DOC_NO = C.STAC_DOC_NO(+) AND 'G' = C.EXCA_ISSU_SE_CD(+) AND 'Y' = C.YEAR_CHG_YN(+) ) A GROUP BY A.WRHS_DOC_NO ,A.WHSDL_BIZRNO ,A.WHSDL_BIZRID ,A.WHSDL_BRCH_ID ,A.WHSDL_BRCH_NO ,A.MFC_BIZRID ,A.MFC_BIZRNO ,A.MFC_BRCH_ID ,A.MFC_BRCH_NO ,A.WRHS_CFM_DT ) C ,( SELECT A.WRHS_CRCT_DOC_NO ,A.WRHS_DOC_NO ,A.EXCA_STD_CD ,A.CRCT_WRHS_CFM_DT ,SUM(CRCT_QTY) AS CRCT_QTY_TOT ,SUM(CRCT_GTN) AS CRCT_GTN_TOT ,SUM(CRCT_WHSL_FEE + CRCT_RTL_FEE) AS CRCT_FEE_TOT ,SUM(CRCT_WHSL_FEE_STAX) AS CRCT_FEE_STAX_TOT ,SUM(CRCT_GTN+CRCT_WHSL_FEE+CRCT_WHSL_FEE_STAX+CRCT_RTL_FEE) AS CRCT_AMT FROM EXCA_WRHS_CRCT A WHERE 1=1 AND WRHS_CRCT_STAT_CD = 'E' /* 도매업자정산 */ AND NVL(MNUL_EXCA_SE, 'C') NOT IN ('M', 'R') /* 수기등록, 재정산등록 */ GROUP BY A.WRHS_CRCT_DOC_NO,A.WRHS_DOC_NO,A.EXCA_STD_CD,A.CRCT_WRHS_CFM_DT ) D WHERE 1=1 AND B.WRHS_DOC_NO = C.WRHS_DOC_NO(+) AND B.LK_WRHS_CRCT_DOC_NO = D.WRHS_CRCT_DOC_NO(+) ) A
ORDER BY WRHS_CRCT_REG_DT DESC, CUST_BIZRNM

SELECT DRCT_RTRVL_CRCT_DOC_NO, B.BIZRNM AS MFC_BIZRNM, B.BRCH_NM AS MFC_BRCH_NM, C.BIZRNM AS CUST_BIZRNM, A.DRCT_RTRVL_DT, D.CTNR_CD, D.CTNR_NM, EPCN_ETC_NM(D.CPCT_CD, 'E001') AS CPCT_NM, EPCN_ETC_NM(D.PRPS_CD, 'E002') AS PRPS_NM, DRCT_RTRVL_CRCT_STAT_CD, EPCN_ETC_NM(DRCT_RTRVL_CRCT_STAT_CD, 'C003') AS DRCT_RTRVL_CRCT_STAT_NM, DRCT_RTRVL_QTY, DRCT_PAY_GTN, DRCT_PAY_FEE, B.BIZR_TP_CD, A.MFC_BIZRID, A.MFC_BIZRNO, A.MFC_BRCH_ID, A.MFC_BRCH_NO, A.CUST_BIZRID, A.CUST_BIZRNO, A.EXCA_STD_CD FROM EXCA_DRCT_RTRVL_CRCT A ,EPCN_BRCH_INFO B ,EPCN_BIZR_INFO C ,EPCN_STD_CTNR_CD D ,(SELECT LANG_SE_CD FROM EPCN_LANG_CD WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' AND STD_YN = 'Y' AND ROWNUM = '1') F WHERE 1=1 AND A.CUST_BIZRID = C.BIZRID AND A.CUST_BIZRNO = C.BIZRNO AND A.MFC_BIZRID = B.BIZRID AND A.MFC_BIZRNO = B.BIZRNO AND A.MFC_BRCH_ID = B.BRCH_ID AND A.MFC_BRCH_NO = B.BRCH_NO AND A.CTNR_CD = D.CTNR_CD AND D.LANG_SE_CD = F.LANG_SE_CD AND A.STAC_DOC_NO = #{STAC_DOC_NO}
ORDER BY A.DRCT_RTRVL_DT DESC, B.BIZRNM, B.BRCH_NM, C.SEL_ORD, C.BIZRNM

SELECT D.BIZRNM ,B.CTNR_NM ,EPCN_ETC_NM(B.CPCT_CD , 'E001') AS CPCT_NM ,EPCN_ETC_NM(B.PRPS_CD , 'E002') AS PRPS_NM ,A.FYER_QTY ,DECODE(RT_INDE_SE,'I','+','D','-') || A.ADJ_RT AS ADJ_RT ,DECODE(QTY_INDE_SE,'I','+','D','-') || A.ADJ_QTY AS ADJ_QTY ,A.ADJ_RST_QTY ,CASE WHEN A.ADJ_RST_QTY >= A.FYER_QTY THEN '+' ELSE '-' END || A.ADJ_GTN AS ADJ_GTN ,EPCN_ETC_NM(A.ADJ_PROC_STAT , 'C021') AS ADJ_PROC_STAT_NM FROM EXCA_FYER_CRCT A ,EPCN_STD_CTNR_CD B ,(SELECT LANG_SE_CD FROM EPCN_LANG_CD WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' AND STD_YN = 'Y' AND ROWNUM = '1') C ,EPCN_BIZR_INFO D WHERE 1=1 AND A.STAC_DOC_NO = #{STAC_DOC_NO} AND A.ADJ_SE = 'C' /* D 출고량조정 C 혼비율조정 */ AND A.CTNR_CD = B.CTNR_CD AND B.LANG_SE_CD = C.LANG_SE_CD AND A.BIZRID = D.BIZRID AND A.BIZRNO = D.BIZRNO ORDER BY B.SEL_ORD, B.CTNR_NM

SELECT D.BIZRNM ,B.CTNR_NM ,EPCN_ETC_NM(B.CPCT_CD , 'E001') AS CPCT_NM ,EPCN_ETC_NM(B.PRPS_CD , 'E002') AS PRPS_NM ,A.FYER_QTY ,DECODE(RT_INDE_SE,'I','+','D','-') || A.ADJ_RT AS ADJ_RT ,DECODE(QTY_INDE_SE,'I','+','D','-') || A.ADJ_QTY AS ADJ_QTY ,A.ADJ_RST_QTY ,CASE WHEN A.ADJ_RST_QTY >= A.FYER_QTY THEN '+' ELSE '-' END || A.ADJ_GTN AS ADJ_GTN ,EPCN_ETC_NM(A.ADJ_PROC_STAT , 'C021') AS ADJ_PROC_STAT_NM FROM EXCA_FYER_CRCT A ,EPCN_STD_CTNR_CD B ,(SELECT LANG_SE_CD FROM EPCN_LANG_CD WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' AND STD_YN = 'Y' AND ROWNUM = '1') C ,EPCN_BIZR_INFO D WHERE 1=1 AND A.STAC_DOC_NO = #{STAC_DOC_NO} AND A.ADJ_SE = 'D' /* D 출고량조정 C 혼비율조정 */ AND A.CTNR_CD = B.CTNR_CD AND B.LANG_SE_CD = C.LANG_SE_CD AND A.BIZRID = D.BIZRID AND A.BIZRNO = D.BIZRNO ORDER BY B.SEL_ORD, B.CTNR_NM

SELECT D.BIZRNM ,B.CTNR_NM ,EPCN_ETC_NM(B.CPCT_CD , 'E001') AS CPCT_NM ,EPCN_ETC_NM(B.PRPS_CD , 'E002') AS PRPS_NM ,A.FYER_QTY ,DECODE(RT_INDE_SE,'I','+','D','-') || A.ADJ_RT AS ADJ_RT ,DECODE(QTY_INDE_SE,'I','+','D','-') || A.ADJ_QTY AS ADJ_QTY ,A.ADJ_RST_QTY ,CASE WHEN A.ADJ_RST_QTY >= A.FYER_QTY THEN '+' ELSE '-' END || A.ADJ_GTN AS ADJ_GTN ,EPCN_ETC_NM(A.ADJ_PROC_STAT , 'C021') AS ADJ_PROC_STAT_NM FROM EXCA_FYER_CRCT A ,EPCN_STD_CTNR_CD B ,(SELECT LANG_SE_CD FROM EPCN_LANG_CD WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' AND STD_YN = 'Y' AND ROWNUM = '1') C ,EPCN_BIZR_INFO D WHERE 1=1 AND A.STAC_DOC_NO = #{STAC_DOC_NO} AND A.ADJ_SE = 'R' /* D 출고량조정 C 혼비율조정 R 입고량조정*/ AND A.CTNR_CD = B.CTNR_CD AND B.LANG_SE_CD = C.LANG_SE_CD AND A.BIZRID = D.BIZRID AND A.BIZRNO = D.BIZRNO ORDER BY B.SEL_ORD, B.CTNR_NM

SELECT A.REQ_CTNR_NM, A.REQ_BIZRNM, A.CFM_CTNR_NM, A.CFM_BIZRNM, A.REQ_QTY, A.CFM_QTY, A.CFM_QTY - A.REQ_QTY AS RST_QTY, ADJ_QTY, A.CFM_QTY - A.REQ_QTY + A.ADJ_QTY AS ADJ_RST_QTY, A.ADJ_GTN, EPCN_ETC_NM(A.ADJ_PROC_STAT , 'C021') AS ADJ_PROC_STAT_NM FROM (SELECT D1.BIZRNM AS REQ_BIZRNM, D2.BIZRNM AS CFM_BIZRNM, B1.CTNR_NM AS REQ_CTNR_NM, B2.CTNR_NM AS CFM_CTNR_NM, CASE #{STAC_DOC_NO} WHEN NVL(A.STAC_DOC_NO,'') THEN FYER_QTY ELSE 0 END AS REQ_QTY , CASE #{STAC_DOC_NO} WHEN NVL(A.STAC_DOC_NO2,'') THEN FYER_QTY ELSE 0 END AS CFM_QTY , A.FYER_QTY AS RST_QTY , DECODE(RT_INDE_SE,'I','+','D','-') || A.ADJ_RT AS ADJ_RT , CASE #{STAC_DOC_NO} WHEN NVL(A.STAC_DOC_NO,'') THEN DECODE(NVL(A.QTY_INDE_SE,''),'I', -1 * NVL(A.ADJ_QTY,0), NVL(A.ADJ_QTY,0)) WHEN NVL(A.STAC_DOC_NO2,'') THEN DECODE(NVL(A.QTY_INDE_SE,''),'D', -1 * NVL(A.ADJ_QTY,0), NVL(A.ADJ_QTY,0)) ELSE 0 END AS ADJ_QTY , A.ADJ_RST_QTY , DECODE(#{STAC_DOC_NO}, NVL(A.STAC_DOC_NO,''), CASE WHEN A.ADJ_RST_QTY > A.FYER_QTY THEN A.ADJ_GTN WHEN A.ADJ_RST_QTY < A.FYER_QTY THEN -1 * A.ADJ_GTN END ,NVL(A.STAC_DOC_NO2,'') , CASE WHEN A.ADJ_RST_QTY > A.FYER_QTY THEN -1 * A.ADJ_GTN WHEN A.ADJ_RST_QTY < A.FYER_QTY THEN A.ADJ_GTN END) AS ADJ_GTN, CASE #{STAC_DOC_NO} WHEN NVL(A.STAC_DOC_NO,'') THEN A.ADJ_PROC_STAT ELSE A.ADJ_PROC_STAT2 END AS ADJ_PROC_STAT FROM EXCA_FYER_CRCT A , EPCN_STD_CTNR_CD B1 , EPCN_STD_CTNR_CD B2 , (SELECT LANG_SE_CD FROM EPCN_LANG_CD WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' AND STD_YN = 'Y' AND ROWNUM = '1') C , EPCN_BIZR_INFO D1 , EPCN_BIZR_INFO D2 WHERE 1=1 AND (A.STAC_DOC_NO = #{STAC_DOC_NO} OR A.STAC_DOC_NO2 = #{STAC_DOC_NO}) AND A.ADJ_SE = 'E' AND A.CTNR_CD = B1.CTNR_CD AND A.CTNR_CD2 = B2.CTNR_CD AND B1.LANG_SE_CD = C.LANG_SE_CD AND B2.LANG_SE_CD = C.LANG_SE_CD AND A.BIZRID = D1.BIZRID AND A.BIZRNO = D1.BIZRNO AND A.BIZRID2 = D2.BIZRID AND A.BIZRNO2 = D2.BIZRNO ) A ORDER BY A.REQ_CTNR_NM, A.CFM_CTNR_NM

SELECT B.BIZRNM ,EXCH_DLIVY_QTY, EXCH_DLIVY_GTN, EXCH_WRHS_QTY, EXCH_WRHS_GTN ,EXCH_DLIVY_GTN-EXCH_WRHS_GTN AS SF_AMT FROM EXCA_EXCH A ,EPCN_BIZR_INFO B WHERE 1=1 AND STAC_DOC_NO = #{STAC_DOC_NO} AND A.EXCH_EXCA_TRGT_BIZRID = B.BIZRID AND A.EXCH_EXCA_TRGT_BIZRNO = B.BIZRNO ORDER BY B.SEL_ORD, B.BIZRNM

SELECT B.BIZRNM AS MFC_BIZRNM ,A.EXCA_REG_DT ,A.EXCA_AMT FROM EPGM_EXCA_LST A ,EPCN_BIZR_INFO B WHERE 1=1 AND A.EXCA_ACP_CFM_SEQ = #{EXCA_ACP_CFM_SEQ} AND A.BIZRID = B.BIZRID AND A.BIZRNO = B.BIZRNO ORDER BY B.SEL_ORD, B.BIZRNM
SELECT ACCT_NO AS VACCT_NO, ACCT_TXDAY AS TR_IL, TX_AMT AS SUM_AMT, JEOKYO FROM EPGM_ACCT_ACP_LK WHERE ACP_CFM_YN = 'Y' AND EXCA_ACP_CFM_SEQ = #{EXCA_ACP_CFM_SEQ} ORDER BY TR_IL

SELECT A.BIZRID || ';' || A.BIZRNO AS BIZRID_NO ,A.BIZRNM ,B.EXCA_ST_DT, B.EXCA_END_DT, B.EXCA_SE_YEAR, B.EXCA_STD_CD FROM EPCN_BIZR_INFO A ,(SELECT * FROM EXCA_STD_MGNT WHERE EXCA_STD_CD = #{EXCA_STD_CD} ) B WHERE 1=1 AND A.BIZR_TP_CD IN ('M1','M2') AND A.BIZR_STAT_CD = 'Y' AND '1' = ( CASE WHEN B.EXCA_TRGT_SE = 'W' THEN '1' ELSE ( SELECT '1' FROM EXCA_TRGT_INFO C WHERE 1=1 AND C.EXCA_STD_CD = B.EXCA_STD_CD AND C.MFC_BIZRID = A.BIZRID AND C.MFC_BIZRNO = A.BIZRNO ) END ) ORDER BY A.SEL_ORD, A.BIZRNM
mapper.update: UPDATE EPGM_EXCA_LST SET EXCA_AMT = (EXCA_AMT - NVL(ADD_AMT,0)) ,RISU_SE = '' ,RISU_RSN = '' ,RISU_DT = '' ,ADD_AMT = '' ,ADD_AMT_SE = '' ,UPD_PRSN_ID = #{S_USER_ID} ,UPD_DTTM = SYSDATE WHERE 1=1 AND STAC_DOC_NO = #{STAC_DOC_NO} AND EXCA_ISSU_SE_CD = #{EXCA_ISSU_SE_CD} AND EXCA_PROC_STAT_CD = 'I' /* 발급 */
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) AS NCNT FROM EPGM_EXCA_LST WHERE 1=1 AND EXCA_PROC_STAT_CD != 'I' /* 발급 */ AND STAC_DOC_NO = #{STAC_DOC_NO} AND EXCA_ISSU_SE_CD = 'C'
mapper.update: UPDATE EPGM_MFC_GTN_BAL A SET DEL_YN = 'Y' ,UPD_PRSN_ID = #{S_USER_ID} ,UPD_DTTM = SYSDATE WHERE 1=1 AND EXISTS ( SELECT 'X' FROM EPGM_EXCA_LST B WHERE 1=1 AND B.STAC_DOC_NO = #{STAC_DOC_NO} AND B.EXCA_PROC_STAT_CD = 'I' /* 정산서발급 */ AND A.MAPP_DOC_NO = B.STAC_DOC_NO )
